title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Check here periodically for events and programs at Ninety Six!            Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Ninety Six National Historic Site Living History Saturday      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: outside visitor center Fees: FREE!     Saturday, August 20, 2016 living history day View Details      Ninety Six National Historic Site Founders Day Centennial Celebration      Time: 10:15 AM to 4:00 PM Location: outside Visitor Center Fees: FREE!     Thursday, August 25, 2016 You only turn 100 once, so we're going big for the Centennial Celebration! Think birthday hats, cake, birthday wishes for the next 100 years, face painting, pin the tail on the bison and pin the badge on the ranger!  View Details
